TopicTitle: Kerbal Rocket Alchemy - KSP 1.0 Career letsplay with a crazy scientist

Articles.Content:
Rocket science, precise calculations, perfect planning... I don't care! Let's just eyeball everything the Kerbal way! It's not rocket science, it's **Kerbal Rocket Alchemy!**

Career, hard, no savescumming.

Current progress 

[![ribbons.png](http://www.kerbaltek.com/users/Alchemist/ribbons.png)](http://www.kerbaltek.com/ribbons)
